p:
Two milliliters of samples consisting of distilled water and different concentrations of the analytes were placed in cuvettes, and 500 μl of an ethanolic solution of DPPH (0.02%) and 1.0 ml of ethanol were added. A control sample containing the DPPH solution without the sample was also prepared. In the blank, the DPPH solution was substituted with ethanol. The antioxidant activity of the sample was evaluated using the inhibition percentage of the DPPH radical with the following equation:
DPPH free radical scavenging rate
=

× 100 % .
